verses.verse: Now there <S%G1161><s%> were some <S%G5100><s%> present <S%G3918><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the same time <S%G2540><s%> who <S%G846><s%> told <S%G518><s%> him <S%G846><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the Galileans, <S%G1057><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> had mixed <S%G3396><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sacrifices. <S%G2378><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G2036><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> "Do you <S%G1380><s%> think that <S%G3754><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> Galileans <S%G1057><s%> were <S%G1096><s%> worse sinners <S%G268><s%> than all <S%G3956><s%> the other Galileans, <S%G1057><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they suffered <S%G3958><s%> such things? <S%G5108><s%>

I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> no, <S%G3780><s%> but <S%G235><s%> unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> you repent, <S%G3340><s%> you will <S%G622><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> perish <S%G622><s%> in the same way. <S%G5615><s%>

Or <S%G2228><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> eighteen, <S%G1176><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3638><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the tower <S%G4444><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> Siloam <S%G4611><s%> fell, <S%G4098><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> killed <S%G615><s%> them; <S%G846><s%> do you <S%G1380><s%> think that <S%G3754><s%> they <S%G3778><s%> were <S%G1096><s%> worse <S%G3844><s%> offenders <S%G3781><s%> than all <S%G3956><s%> the men <S%G444><s%> who dwell <S%G2730><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem? <S%G2419><s%>

I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> no, <S%G3780><s%> but, <S%G235><s%> unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> you repent, <S%G3340><s%> you will <S%G622><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> perish <S%G622><s%> in the same way. <S%G3668><s%>"

He spoke <S%G3004><s%> <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> parable. <S%G3850><s%> "A certain <S%G5100><s%> man had <S%G2192><s%> a fig tree <S%G4808><s%> planted <S%G5452><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> vineyard, <S%G290><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> <S%G1722><s%> on it, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> none. <S%G3756><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> He <S%G2036><s%> said to <S%G4314><s%> the vine dresser, <S%G289><s%> <S%G2400><s%> 'Behold, these three <S%G5140><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> I have come <S%G2064><s%> looking <S%G2212><s%> for fruit <S%G2590><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> fig tree, <S%G4808><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> none. <S%G3756><s%> Cut <S%G1581><s%> it <S%G846><s%> down. <S%G1581><s%> Why <S%G2444><s%> does <S%G2532><s%> it <S%G3588><s%> waste <S%G2673><s%> the soil? <S%G1093><s%>'

He <S%G1161><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> <S%G3004><s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2962><s%> 'Lord, leave <S%G863><s%> it <S%G846><s%> alone <S%G863><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> year <S%G2094><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3755><s%> I dig <S%G4626><s%> around <S%G4012><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fertilize <S%G2874><s%> it. <S%G906><s%>

If <S%G2579><s%> <S%G99999><s%> it bears <S%G4160><s%> fruit, <S%G2590><s%> fine; <S%G1161><s%> but if <S%G1487><s%> not, <S%G3361><s%> after <S%G1519><s%> that, <S%G3195><s%> you can cut <S%G1581><s%> it <S%G846><s%> down. <S%G1581><s%>'"
He <S%G1161><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> teaching <S%G1321><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the synagogues <S%G4864><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the Sabbath day. <S%G4521><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> who had <S%G2192><s%> a spirit <S%G4151><s%> of infirmity <S%G769><s%> eighteen <S%G1176><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3638><s%> years, <S%G2094><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> she was <S%G2258><s%> bent over, <S%G4794><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> way <S%G3838><s%> straighten herself up. <S%G352><s%>

When <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> her, <S%G846><s%> he called <S%G4377><s%> her, <S%G2532><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to her, <S%G846><s%> "Woman, <S%G1135><s%> you are freed <S%G630><s%> from your <S%G4675><s%> infirmity. <S%G769><s%>"

He <S%G2532><s%> laid <S%G2007><s%> his hands <S%G5495><s%> on her, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G3916><s%> she stood up straight, <S%G461><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> glorified <S%G1392><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

The <S%G1161><s%> ruler of the synagogue, <S%G752><s%> being <S%G611><s%> indignant <S%G23><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had healed <S%G2323><s%> on the Sabbath, <S%G4521><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> "There are <S%G1526><s%> six <S%G1803><s%> days <S%G4521><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> which men <S%G3739><s%> ought <S%G1163><s%> to work. <S%G2038><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> on those <S%G3778><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> and be healed, <S%G2323><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> on the Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day! <S%G2250><s%>"

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532><s%> "You hypocrites! <S%G5273><s%> <S%G3089><s%> Doesn't <S%G3756><s%> each one <S%G1538><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> free <S%G3089><s%> his <S%G846><s%> ox <S%G1016><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> his donkey <S%G3688><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the stall <S%G5336><s%> on the Sabbath, <S%G4521><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lead <S%G520><s%> him away <S%G520><s%> to water? <S%G4222><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Ought <S%G1163><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> this woman, <S%G3778><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> a daughter <S%G2364><s%> of Abraham, <S%G11><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> had bound <S%G1210><s%> eighteen <S%G1176><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3638><s%> long <S%G2400><s%> years, <S%G2094><s%> be freed <S%G3089><s%> from <S%G575><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> bondage <S%G1199><s%> on the Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day? <S%G2250><s%>"

As <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> these things, <S%G5023><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> his <S%G846><s%> adversaries <S%G480><s%> were disappointed, <S%G2617><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> rejoiced <S%G5463><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the glorious <S%G1741><s%> things that <S%G3588><s%> were done <S%G1096><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

He <S%G3004><s%> said, <S%G5101><s%> "What is <S%G2076><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> like? <S%G3664><s%> To <S%G2532><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall I compare <S%G3666><s%> it? <S%G846><s%>

It is <S%G2076><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> a grain <S%G2848><s%> of mustard seed, <S%G4615><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> took, <S%G2983><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> put <S%G906><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G1438><s%> own garden. <S%G2779><s%> It <S%G2532><s%> grew, <S%G837><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> <S%G1519><s%> a large tree, <S%G1186><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the birds <S%G4071><s%> of the sky <S%G3772><s%> lodged <S%G2681><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> its <S%G846><s%> branches. <S%G2798><s%>"
<S%G2532><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> he said, <S%G2036><s%> "To what <S%G5101><s%> shall I compare <S%G3666><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%>

It is <S%G2076><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> yeast, <S%G2219><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> and hid <S%G1470><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> measures <S%G4568><s%> of flour, <S%G224><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> it <S%G3739><s%> was all <S%G3650><s%> leavened. <S%G2220><s%>"

He <S%G2532><s%> went <S%G1279><s%> on his way through <S%G2596><s%> cities <S%G4172><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> villages, <S%G2968><s%> teaching, <S%G1321><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> traveling <S%G4160><s%> <S%G4197><s%> on to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>

"Strive <S%G75><s%> to enter in <S%G1525><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the narrow <S%G4728><s%> door, <S%G4439><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> many, <S%G4183><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> will seek <S%G2212><s%> to enter in, <S%G1525><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will <S%G2480><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be able. <S%G2480><s%>

When <S%G575><s%> once <S%G3739><s%> <S%G99999><s%> the master of the house <S%G3617><s%> has risen up, <S%G1453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> has shut <S%G608><s%> the door, <S%G2374><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you begin <S%G756><s%> to stand <S%G2476><s%> outside, <S%G1854><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to knock <S%G2925><s%> at the door, <S%G2374><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G2962><s%> 'Lord, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> open <S%G455><s%> to us! <S%G2254><s%>' then he will answer <S%G611><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> tell <S%G2046><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3756><s%> 'I don't know <S%G1492><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> or where <S%G4159><s%> you come from. <S%G5209><s%>'

Then <S%G5119><s%> you will begin <S%G756><s%> to say, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5315><s%> 'We ate and <S%G2532><s%> drank <S%G4095><s%> in your <S%G4675><s%> presence, <S%G1799><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you taught <S%G1321><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> streets. <S%G4113><s%>'

He <S%G2532><s%> will say, <S%G2046><s%> <S%G3004><s%> 'I tell you, <S%G5213><s%> I don't <S%G3756><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G99999><s%> where <S%G4159><s%> you come from. <S%G2075><s%> Depart <S%G868><s%> from <S%G575><s%> me, <S%G1700><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> you workers <S%G2040><s%> of iniquity. <S%G93><s%>'

There <S%G1563><s%> will be <S%G2071><s%> weeping <S%G2805><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gnashing <S%G1030><s%> of teeth, <S%G3599><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> you see <S%G3700><s%> Abraham, <S%G11><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Isaac, <S%G2464><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Jacob, <S%G2384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> yourselves <S%G5209><s%> being thrown <S%G1544><s%> outside. <S%G1854><s%>

They <S%G2532><s%> will come <S%G2240><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the east, <S%G395><s%> <S%G2532><s%> west, <S%G1424><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G575><s%> north, <S%G1005><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> south, <S%G3558><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will sit down <S%G347><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> there are some who are <S%G1526><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> will be <S%G2071><s%> first, <S%G4413><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> there are some who are <S%G1526><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> will be <S%G2071><s%> last. <S%G2078><s%>"

On that same <S%G846><s%> day, <S%G2250><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> came, <S%G4334><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to him, <S%G846><s%> "Get out <S%G1831><s%> of here, <S%G2532><s%> and go <S%G4198><s%> away, <S%G4198><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> wants <S%G2309><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> you. <S%G4571><s%>"

He <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, <S%G846><s%> "Go <S%G4198><s%> and tell <S%G2036><s%> that <S%G3778><s%> fox, <S%G258><s%> <S%G2400><s%> 'Behold, I cast out <S%G1544><s%> demons <S%G1140><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> perform <S%G2005><s%> cures <S%G2392><s%> today <S%G4594><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> tomorrow, <S%G839><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> day I complete my mission. <S%G5048><s%>

Nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> I <S%G3165><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> go <S%G4198><s%> on my way today <S%G4594><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> tomorrow <S%G839><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> next <S%G2192><s%> day, <S%G3754><s%> for it <S%G1735><s%> can't <S%G3756><s%> be <S%G1735><s%> that a prophet <S%G4396><s%> perish <S%G622><s%> outside of <S%G1854><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>'

"Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> kills <S%G615><s%> the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> stones <S%G3036><s%> those who <S%G3588><s%> are sent <S%G649><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> her! <S%G846><s%> How often <S%G4212><s%> I wanted <S%G2309><s%> to gather <S%G1996><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> together, <S%G1996><s%> like <S%G3739><s%> a <S%G5158><s%> hen <S%G3733><s%> gathers her <S%G1438><s%> own brood <S%G3555><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> her wings, <S%G4420><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you <S%G2309><s%> refused! <S%G3756><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> is left <S%G863><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> desolate. <S%G2048><s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G281><s%> I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, <S%G3754><s%> you will <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3361><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> <S%G2240><s%> <S%G3753><s%> you say, <S%G2036><s%> <S%G2127><s%> 'Blessed is he who <S%G3588><s%> comes <S%G2240><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord! <S%G2962><s%>'"
